new_addons.name: Advanced Question Types
new_addons.description: The Advanced Questions plugin allows you to include three powerful question types in your Quizzes and Surveys, including radio and checkbox grids and matching pairs questions.

new_addons.name: Pro Bundle
new_addons.description: All QSM Addons in one single and affordable package. Over 34 addons are included in this package and new addons are added automatically. Save over $1600 by buying our bundle.

new_addons.name: Plus Bundle
new_addons.description: 14+ addons to add useful features to your quiz and surveys.

new_addons.name: Basic Bundle
new_addons.description: All the right addons to get you started with QSM premium features.

popular_products.name: Google Sheet Connector
popular_products.description: This addon automates the process of sending form responses in real time, with responses immediately synced to your selected Google Sheet.

popular_products.name: Paypal and Stripe Payment Integration
popular_products.description: With this addon, create paid quizzes and tests on your website and allow users to pay by credit card or transfer payments using Stripe and PayPal payment processors.

popular_products.name: Save & Resume
popular_products.description: The Save & Resume addon allows you to save and resume unfinished quizzes/exams and allow people to complete the quiz at their convenience.

popular_products.name: Simple Popups
popular_products.description: Display quizzes and surveys as popups Simply install the plugin and you can start creating popups in minutes.

popular_products.name: Google Analytics Tracking
popular_products.description: Google Analytics addon helps in tracking quiz and survey submissions and deliver custom events when visitors complete your quizzes and surveys.

popular_products.name: Logic
popular_products.description: You can use the Logic addon to add logic and conditions to your quizzes and surveys. Displaying questions based on the user’s reaction humanizes your quizzes.

popular_products.name: Reporting & Analysis
popular_products.description: This plugin enables you to analyze quiz/survey results through the use of various charts and graphs. You can even filter and export the data for further research.

popular_products.name: Zapier Integration
popular_products.description: By automating your work, this plugin can save you time and help you achieve more powerful results. Connect various services and send your results to over 700 websites.

popular_products.name: Export Results
popular_products.description: This addon enables you to export quiz results as a CSV or PDF file. You can export fields such as correct/incorrect responses, total correct answers, total questions, score, and so on.

popular_products.name: User Dashboard
popular_products.description: Display a personalized dashboard to your users that includes Quiz/Survey information such as the Quiz Name, Score Earned, Time Taken, Time to Complete, and so on.

on_sale_products.name: Google Sheet Connector
on_sale_products.description: This addon automates the process of sending form responses in real time, with responses immediately synced to your selected Google Sheet.
